folder: Meeker Avenue & Monitor Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
142-144 Meeker Avenue (tracks thereon) south side, at and adjoining Monitor Street, also shown is the east side of Monitor
Street, south from Meeker Avenue.
August 13, 1938.
P. L. Sperr

folder: Meeker Avenue & Monitor Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Meeker Avenue, south side, west from Monitor Street, showing at the corner the Kroder Riebl Co. plant, manufacturers of brass goods.
view 1: August 13, 1938
View 2: September 1, 1939

P. L. Sperr

Note: The buildings shown in view 1 were torn down later to make way for the approach to the Kosciuszko Bridge over Newtown Creek.

View 2 shows the S.E. corner of Meeker and Monitor, after some of the buildings were razed.
